text:
#pharmacynews #Vaccine ‘time bomb’ in Wales if #pharmacies not utilised. https://t.co/ZAuL8sv3si
Wales faces a “ticking time bomb” if work doesn't begin to commission #communitypharmacies to administer #Covid19 vaccines, Community Pharmacy Wales chair Mark Griffiths has said. https://t.co/pWd13cyeuA
